mapper.select: select p.halin,c.pcode, p.pimg, p.title, p.price,p.baesong, c.id, c.writeday, c.su from cart as c, product as p where userid=#{param} and c.pcode=p.pcode
select count(*) from cart where pcode=#{param1} and userid=#{param2}
mapper.update: update cart set su=su+1 where pcode=#{param1} and userid=#{param2}
update cart set su=#{param1} where pcode=#{param2} and userid=#{param3}
mapper.select: select g.id, g.writeday,p.pimg,p.title,g.su,g.cprice,g.state from gumae as g, product as p where g.userid=#{param} and g.pcode=p.pcode order by g.writeday desc, g.id desc
mapper.update: update gumae set state=#{state} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select pcode from gumae where id=#{param}
select pimg,title from product where pcode=#{param}
select pimg,title,pcode from product where pcode=(select pcode from gumae where id=#{param})
